sentence.Network_en: Instead, I shall adopt what is known as the Weak Anthropic Principle.

sentence.Network_en: Geoscience is the prerequisite basic science of the society development, anthropic lives.

sentence.Network_en: All in anthropic history would become smoke and cloud through your eyes excepting immortal culture.
sentence.Network_cn: 人类历史中的一切终将成为过眼烟云,惟一文化不朽.
